author: CBC News
title: What you need to know about COVID-19 in B.C. on April 11, 2020
description: Dr. Bonnie Henry will provide an update on the pandemic in B.C. from Victoria at noon.
content:
THE LATEST:
  • 40 new cases of COVID-19 and five more deaths were announced Friday. 
  • The total number of people who have tested positive in B.C. is now 1,410.
  • 55 people have died.
  • 879 patients have recovered from the illness.
